meanings.definition: To eat food enthusiastically or greedily.
meanings.sent1: She was noshing on popcorn during the movie.
meanings.sent2: He loves noshing on chips while watching TV.
meanings.sent3: The dog was caught noshing on the leftovers from the table.
meanings.sent4: The squirrel was noshing on nuts like there was no tomorrow.
meanings.sent5: The kids were noshing on candy at the birthday party.

meanings.sent1: I always have some noshing in my bag for a quick snack.
meanings.sent2: The party had a variety of noshing for everyone to enjoy.
meanings.sent3: The office always has a stash of noshing for the employees.
meanings.sent4: The vending machine is full of noshing options.
meanings.sent5: She packed a bag of noshing for the road trip.
